improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Returns a comprehensive weather forecast with unparalleled accuracy and precision, providing users with detailed temperature, precipitation, and weather condition forecasts for any duration. This tool is ideal for those who require reliable and up-to-date weather information for planning or research purposes. With its advanced algorithms and extensive data coverage, this tool provides accurate forecasts for both short-term (up to 5 days) and long-term (up to 14 days) periods.
name: weather_forecast_pro
